title: Limited Investment in Research and Development
description: In 2018, Mauritania allocated only 0.01% of its GDP to research and development, indicating minimal investment in innovation and technological advancement.

title: High Lead Time for Imports
description: As of 2016, the median lead time to import goods into Mauritania was 32 days, suggesting significant delays in the import process.

title: Minimal Reliance on Insurance and Financial Services in Imports
description: In 2023, insurance and financial services accounted for only 0.04% of Mauritania's service imports, reflecting a low dependency on these services in international trade.
